A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a die-hard Start Wars fan all my life. On top of seeing all the movies in innumerable amount of times playing all of the video games reading most of the expanded universe (which is now no longer canon) I truely do not understand the hate this movie is receiving. Yes it does challenge your personal perceptions of what the force is and its limitations but it's no different from any other canon story that any other author or creative mind has ever done when they have been given the monumental task of expanding on the Star Wars universe. At least this time they didn't get an even bigger Death Star with another exhaust port to blow up in the 3rd act...
